# Fused Documentation

> Fused is an end-to-end cloud platform for data analytics, built around User Defined Functions (UDFs): Python functions that can be run via HTTPS requests from anywhere, without any install required.

## Python SDK

- [Authentication](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/authentication) - Authenticate Jupyter Notebooks to use the Fused Python SDK
- [Changelog](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/changelog) -   the preferences page.)...
- [Top-Level Functions](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/top-level-functions) - A decorator that transforms a function into a Fused UDF....
- [fused.api](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/api-reference/api) - The following functions can be called directly from the `fused.api` module:...
- [fused.h3](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/api-reference/h3) - Run the raster to H3 ingestion process....
- [JobPool](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/api-reference/jobpool) - The `JobPool` class is used to manage, inspect and retrieve results from...
- [fused.options](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/api-reference/options) - List global configuration options....
- [Udf](https://docs.fused.io/python-sdk/api-reference/udf) - The `Udf` class is the object you get when defining a UDF with the...
